summary: Comprehensive testing of prestressed beam design application completed. Backend APIs functional with 2 calculation bugs identified. Frontend UI working excellently with professional design and successful backend integration.

critical_bugs.issue: Harped profile tendon calculation throws 'float division by zero' error
critical_bugs.error_details: Division by zero error in harped profile calculations

critical_bugs.issue: PDF generation fails with 'Style BodyText already defined in stylesheet' error
critical_bugs.error_details: ReportLab style definition conflict in PDF generator

working_endpoints: /api/design/analyze - Works for rectangular, t-beam, i-beam sections
/api/design/analyze - Works for straight, parabolic, multi-parabolic profiles

ui_bugs.issue: T-beam and I-beam selectors not easily accessible via automation selectors
ui_bugs.note: UI elements appear to be present based on screenshots, may be selector-related

ui_bugs.issue: Multi-parabolic profile selector not easily accessible
ui_bugs.note: Visual selector appears functional in UI

passed_tests: Dashboard page loads with navigation and stats
New Design button navigates to /design page
Basic form inputs (project name, beam name, span, dimensions)
Materials tab - concrete grade selector and steel properties
Prestress configuration inputs and most tendon profiles
Analysis button triggers successful backend analysis
Results display with comprehensive engineering calculations
Section view and Magnel diagram visualization tabs
PDF button enabled after successful analysis

critical: Fix harped profile calculation division by zero error in /app/backend/calculations.py
Fix PDF generation style conflict in /app/backend/pdf_generator.py
optional: Verify section type selectors have proper data-testid attributes for automation
Verify multi-parabolic tendon profile selector accessibility
